content.rendered:
The TGP evaluation has been completed, and we are delighted to announce the list of TGP recipients:

***The TGP recipients are a total of 21 individuals, The waiting list has been closed.***

We look forward to meeting you at the FOSS4G Asia 2023 Seoul.

Aadesh Baral
Aprilia Nidia Rinasti
Bilguuntugs Tovuusuren
Charmyne Mamador
Deepak Pradhan
Dimple Jain
Feye Andal
Francis Josef Gasgonia
Fritz Dariel Andal
Hamidreza Ostadabbas
Duan Ho Dinh
Jashanpreet Singh
Koushikey Chhapariya
Krishna Lodha
Kshitij Raj Sharma
Masoud Minaei
Prabhakaran Palanisamy
Reshma Shrestha
Shogo Hirasawa
Syachrul Arief
Winston Yap

What is included?

Travel grants include a discounted admission to the main conference and round-trip airfare. However, please note that accommodation expenses will not be covered, and participants will be responsible for arranging their own accommodations. Upon registration, we kindly request a payment of USD 50 as a commitment to attending the conference.

*** FOSS4G-Asia 2023 Travel Grants Announcement ***

We are pleased to announce the Travel Grant Program (TGP) for FOSS4G-Asia 2023 Seoul, which aims to enable deserving individuals to attend the event. Please read the TGP guidelines below and if you meet the eligibility criteria, feel free to submit your application.

Who is eligible?

The travel grants are available to individuals from Asian countries, with a focus on assisting those who would not be able to attend otherwise. If you have the means to attend on your own, we kindly request that you refrain from applying. In an effort to foster a diverse community, priority will be given to students, women, and minority attendees from low-income and lower-middle-income countries as classified by the World Bank (see: https://blogs.worldbank.org/opendata/new-world-bank-country-classifications-income-level-2022-2023). These groups have historically been underrepresented in the open-source community, and we strive to address this disparity. Applicants who have been selected as conference speakers will be given preference.

How do I apply?

The application process will be open from June 1st until August 19th on the FOSS4G-ASIA Seoul 2023 website.

Deadline

We only accept the TGP application received by 18th August(23:59UTC).

Application Form(Application Closed!)
